product_name: NUUN All Day Hydration Tablets - Mixed 4 Pack
long_description: This mixed 4-pack of NUUN All Day hydration tablets is the perfect way to stay hydrated throughout the day, whether you're at work or in the mountains. Variety pack contains 1 tube each of Blueberry Pomegranate, Grapefruit Orange, Grape Raspberry, and Tangerine Lime: 12 tablets per tube. Just drop 1 tablet into 16 fl. oz. of water, wait 2 min., drink and presto-optimum hydration. NUUN doesn't contain sugar or carbohydrates, so there's no need to worry about the extra calories usually found in sport drinks. Under 8 calories per tablet; contain a blend of A, B, C, D and E vitamins. Tablets are stored in 1.25 x 4 in. plastic tubes that easily fit into a backpack or jacket pocket. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: This mixed 4-pack of NUUN All Day hydration tablets is the perfect way to stay hydrated throughout the day, whether you're at work or in the mountains.
